verbs.description: happy pagan new year [ARG1: happy] [V: pagan] [ARG1: new year] for many pagans samhain is the pagan new year but not all pagans feel that way jason at raise the horns celebrates a variety of new years and explains why samhain has never felt like the start of something new to him new year
